作者的原文内容
This mod is the successor to the original Dragon Mounts created by Barracuda/ATA4. The purpose of DML (Dragon Mounts: Legacy) is that its a simple port of the original dragon mounts to modern minecraft versions, with a few more changes and fixes.The original project can be found here: https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/minecraft-mods/wip-mods/1439594-dragon-mounts-r46-wip
This is NOT Dragon Mounts 2 and it will not have the major features of it.We plan to have more simple additions to DML in the future, so keep an eye out.

"This is a mod that allows you to hatch previously useless dragon eggs. Once fostered and tamed, they'll be your faithful companion in all situations and, of course, can be used for a ride!"
- ATA4 The LATEST version of 1.15.2 Forge is REQUIRED
目前MOD还未完全完成，仅有部分龙和龙蛋的添加，后续的更新中会进一步完善MOD的相关内容，可以关注一下原作者来查看更新。
值得注意的一点是Dragon Mounts: Legacy并非Dragon Mounts 2，所以并没有包含Dragon Mounts 2的大部分特性。

下载地址
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dragon-mounts-legacy请前往原贴下载以支持作者
关于汉化
因为内容较少所以我对内容进行了一定的汉化，放出下载:汉化 提取码:s1hf汉化安装方法：压缩包形式打开MOD的jar文件，将下载下来的文件拖入assets\dragonmounts\lang
